DOC.detailed_description: Patients recruit HIV clinic University Texas Southwestern Medical School Veterans Administration Hospital direct invitation Dr. Margolis ( adult HIV clinic director University director NIH-ACTG ) . We recruit 20 HIV-infected adult male treat stable protease inhibitor therapy regimen past 6 month . One half subject evidence lipoatrophy ( defined ACTG29 ) . Each subject baseline ( BL ) measure make , start GH depot subcutaneous AQ . Patients follow every two week first six week , every three month remainder study . Study parameter measure include ( also see flow chart appendix ) : - Baseline , 3 , 6 12 month : OGTT , testosterone level , whole body protein turnover , hepatic glucose production gluconeogenesis measure , DXA scan ( measure lean tissue mass bone density ) , bone mineral marker , rest energy expenditure , calorie count , T cell subset , TNF µ level . - Every 3 month : IGF-1 ( obtain every 2 week first 6 week ) , body weight , post-prandial glucose level . - Baseline , 6 12 months- CT scan measurement thymus size
